description:
While trying to find their way off the station to go after Midge and Wan who were ejected out into space, Ellen and the others are stopped by the frogs. Ellen and the others lead the frogs on a frantic chase that ends with the frogs on the wrong end of the mice. The laboratory the erupts into chaos. Meanwhile, Midge and Wan are floating through space losing hope of ever seeing their friends again when Wan realizes they can use the gravitation pull of a nearby planet to do a special maneuver called a swing-by. Will they be able to manage the maneuver and make their way back to their friends?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メチャクチャ実験室 / 脱出! パニックステーション
